description: WYSIWYG Markdown editor for VS Code powered by Vditor, with smart image organization, alignment handling, and cleanup.
config.lineNumbers: Enable line numbers in code blocks.
config.tab: Tab characters used in the editor.
config.mathEngine: Math engine used for rendering equations.
config.uploads.location: Directory to store images relative to the markdown file.
config.uploads.autoOrganize: Automatically rename and reorganize images in the image directory based on the naming pattern when saving.
